reg_pit.title: Railway and Pipeline Corporations Valuation Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 372/2010, effective December 17, 2010.

section.sectiontext: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2008 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 221/2011, effective December 5, 2011.

section.sectiontext: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2011 and subsequent taxation years.

section.sectiontext: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2012 and subsequent taxation years.

section.sectiontext: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2013 and subsequent taxation years.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation shall be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2014 and subsequent taxation years.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation must be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2017 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 312/2021, effective December 1, 2021.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation must be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2021 and subsequent taxation years.

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 258/2022, effective December 1, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation must be used for determinations of value for the purposes of assessment for the 2022 and subsequent taxation years.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The actual value of the track in place of a railway corporation shall be determined using the following rates:

Section 3 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 316/2016, effective December 19, 2016.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The actual value of the track in place of a railway corporation shall be determined using the following rates:

change.changenote: Section 3 (2) (a) to (k) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 243/2017, effective December 20, 2017.
Section 3 (2) (a) to (k) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 282/2018, effective December 14, 2018.

Section 3 (2) (a) to (k) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 258/2022, effective December 1, 2022.
Section 4 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 316/2016, effective December 19, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:text: The actual value of pipelines referred to in section 21 (1) (c) of the Assessment Act shall, except where section 5 applies, be determined by applying the rates set out in Schedule A for gathering pipelines and Schedule B for transmission pipelines.

change.changenote: Section 5 (1) (a) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 372/2010, effective December 17, 2010.

paragraph.paragraphtext: an abandonment certificate has been issued under section 9 of the Pipeline Act and the certificate has been presented to the assessment authority, and

change.changenote: Section 5 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 316/2016, effective December 19, 2016.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Where, in respect of a pipeline referred to in section 21 (1) (c) of the Assessment Act,

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the pipeline has been abandoned in accordance with the Oil and Gas Activities Act and in respect of which the permit holder has obtained a certificate of restoration, and
the pipeline would, if valued under section 19 of the Assessment Act and in that reference to section 21 of the Assessment Act, have no value,

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: the actual value of the pipeline shall be determined using a rate of one dollar.
Where operations of a pipeline have been suspended for a period of one year or more, 10% of the scheduled rate for the pipe size shall be used.
Where a pipeline is placed directly on the ground and, except for extraordinary stream or ravine crossings, is without man-made foundations, it shall be valued at 50% of the scheduled rate if

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the length of that section of the pipeline is 20 km or over, and
the diameter of the pipe, throughout the section, is not more than 168 mm.

change.changenote: Section 5 (3) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 44/2021, effective February 25, 2021.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Where a pipeline is placed directly on the ground and, except for extraordinary stream or ravine crossings, is without man-made foundations, it must be valued at 50% of the scheduled rate if

change.changenote: Section 6 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 316/2016, effective December 19, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Where the track in place referred to in section 21 (1) (b) or a pipeline referred to in section 21 (1) (c) of the Assessment Act is under construction, the assessor shall determine the percentage complete as of October 31 and the actual value of the track in place or pipeline shall be determined by applying the percentage complete to the rate prescribed for that class.

change.changenote: Section 8 was enacted by BC Reg 252/2013, effective December 11, 2013.
Section 8 BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 316/2016, effective December 19, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Pursuant to section 21 (4.1) of the Assessment Act, the assessment authority, being of the opinion that the rates for valuing improvements under section 3 (2) of this regulation have changed substantially for the 2014 taxation year from the rates for the 2013 taxation year, the rate that would have been in effect for the 2014 taxation year will be phased in equally over three years.
